We are a Spirit-led people gathered to care for and empower each other by stewarding God's resources to impact our community for Christ

  • Worship Gatherings

    We gather for worship every Sunday at 9:15 and 10:45 a.m. The early service is classical in style and the later is more contemporary in style . . . more

  • Missional Communities

    We gather in mid-size groups for mission and fellowship . . . more

  • Life Groups

    We gather in smaller groups for bible study, accountability and community projects. These groups provide support, challenge and closeness . . . more

  • Children and Youth

    Teams provide child care, age-appropriate worship and groups. We strive to provide an environment for children and youth to grow and learn.

  • Weekly News

    See what is going on this week at First Baptist. . . . more

  • Calendar

    Take a look at a live church calendar to see what is going on today at First Baptist . . . more

Directions

About Us

First Baptist Church Muncie has a rich history, but is also a forward looking, ministry-oriented congregation.
First Baptist is located at 309 E. Adams Street, Muncie, IN 47396, Phone: 765-284-7749

Flickr

    Read recent publications from First Baptist Church. A weekly bulletin and a monthly newsletter may give you insight into how we live out our calling in this city.
